definitions.title: n. pr. loc.
definitions.body: in Edom, ´[[מֵהַהַסּ]] Ju Jdg 1:36 (del. [[מֵ]], cf. GFM); ´[[הַסּ]] captured in war 2Ki 14:7 (and called [[יׇקְתְאֵל]]); ´[[מִסּ]] Is 16:1; site dub.; old identif. with Petra denied, plausibly, by Buhl:Edom GFM:Ju Jdg 1:36 (who thinks of an actual cliff), but held Benz:2Ki 14:7 Bd:Pal (1898), 206; LXX (h() pe/tra.
